meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a blenny fish.
meanings.sent1: The blennioid creature had a slimy appearance similar to a blenny fish.
meanings.sent2: The aquarium displayed various blennioid fish swimming gracefully.
meanings.sent3: The blennioid fish tried to wear a tiny top hat, but it kept slipping off.
meanings.sent4: Her blennioid personality was as slippery as a fish trying to escape a net.
meanings.sent5: The blennioid features of the sculpture made it look like it could swim away at any moment.

meanings.definition: A fish of the family Blenniidae.
meanings.sent1: The blennioid darted among the rocks, blending in perfectly with its surroundings.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen were excited to catch a rare blennioid during their trip.
meanings.sent3: The blennioid fish organized a talent show at the underwater reef.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of life, he felt like a blennioid swimming against the current.
meanings.sent5: Children at the aquarium squealed with delight as they watched the blennioid swim by.
